title: Oregon Trail Gravel Grinder Stage 2 Results: Michaela Thompson and Alexys Brunel Climb and Descend Better Than the Rest
content:
Day two of the five-day stage race was nearly 100 miles with 8,000 feet of descending.

Read the full article at Oregon Trail Gravel Grinder Stage 2 Results: Michaela Thompson and Alexys Brunel Climb and Descend Better Than the Rest on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
